entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Long-running IAsyncEnumerable<T> leaks the last seen enumerated value. #74013
  • It looks like PEEventSymbol's constructor assumes that we always have both accessors. #74011
  • Test Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer.UnitTests.DocumentChanges.DocumentChangesTests.FindReferencesInChangingDocument(mutatingLspWorkspace: False) failed in CI #74009
  • Link in docs/contributing/README.md should work. #74005

Closed

  • A potential bug in custom string interpolation constructor resolving for `ref` parameters #73690
    17.11
  • Unexpected SemanticModel responses related to ValueTuples when it involves a nullable element #73052
    Backlog
  • Permit Where to do nullability checks #74008
  • Overridden != and == do not affect nullability #74010
  • Generic parameter constrained to implement true, false, &, |, operators in separate interfaces still generates CS0217 or CS0218 error #74000
  • WINDOWS Preprocessor not hiding CA1416 with target framework net8.0-windows #74004

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flakiness in LSP references tests due to non-deterministic ordering #74014
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • WIP run iterations to test in CI #73997
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix the duplicate glyphs in Inheritance margin #73996
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure source generated documents are up-to-date before analyzing EnC changes #73989
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix project configuration telemetry for legacy csproj projects #73995
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73999
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support goto-def taking you from an interceptor method to the location being intercepted. #73992
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #73998
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Consider extension receiver conversion when reducing #73762
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Prefer implicit span conversions #73765
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #73954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit extension marker method as public #73994
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2474078 #73982
    auto-merge
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
